adept.common

Class EventMention

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.EventMention
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasScoredUnaryAttributes

    public final class EventMention
extends HltContent
implements HasScoredUnaryAttributes
    Represents an event where the arguments are particular chunks of text which may or may not be further resolved. Typically this will also be associated with text supporting the event, but this is not required.

    For high-level documentation of all event classes, see DocumentEvent.

    This class is locally immutable.
